i mean can you imagine the first guy who was sitting on a riverbank one day and said, either to himself or someone nearby, "ya know what? i am gonna go eat that snail" or the first person to say "boy that frog looks yummy and i bet its legs would be tasty". i should also point out that in chinese the word for frog (when you are using the term in the context of being a food, at least) basically translates into "field chicken". specified the context because it has other names just like most things do based on the context of the discussion.
